price: Уни бир белги қилиб қолдирдик. Бас, бирон ибрат олгувчи борми?!
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: Uzbek Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
